statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null || true; git_branch=$(git rev-parse --abbrev-ref HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$git_branch" ]; then printf '\033[36m%s@%s \033[32m%s \033[33m(%s)\033[0m' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$cwd")" "$git_branch"; else printf '\033[36m%s@%s \033[32m%s\033[0m' "$(whoami)" "$(hostname -s)" "$(basename "$cwd")"; fi
